result.eng: I'll talk to you at lunch time.
result.ga: Labhróidh mé leat ag am lóin
result.orig: Labhróidh mé leat ag am lóin
result.html: Labhróidh mé leat ag am lóinI'll talk to you at lunch time.
result.ponchtml: Laḃróiḋ mé leat ag am lóinI'll talk to you at lunch time.

result.eng: Would you like to have lunch with me?
result.ga: Ar mhaith leat lón a chaitheamh liom
result.orig: Ar mhaith leat lón a chaitheamh liom

result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat lón a ċaiṫeaṁ liomWould you like to have lunch with me?

result.eng: The restaurant tends to be quite busy at lunchtime.
result.ga: Bíonn an bhialann gnóthach go leor ag am lóin
result.orig: Bíonn an bhialann gnóthach go leor ag am lóin

result.ponchtml: Bíonn an ḃialann gnóṫaċ go leor ag am lóinThe restaurant tends to be quite busy at lunchtime.

result.ga: An itheann tú lón go luath
result.orig: An itheann tú lón go luath
result.html: An itheann tú lón go luathDo you eat lunch early?
result.ponchtml: An iṫeann tú lón go luaṫDo you eat lunch early?

result.html: Ithigí bhur lónEat your lunch!
result.ponchtml: Iṫigí ḃur lónEat your lunch!

result.eng: I have my lunch between one and two.
result.ga: Bíonn mo lón agam idir a haon agus a dó
result.orig: Bíonn mo lón agam idir a haon agus a dó
result.html: Bíonn mo lón agam idir a haon agus a dóI have my lunch between one and two.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn mo lón agam idir a haon agus a dóI have my lunch between one and two.

result.eng: What time do you have your lunch?

result.ponchtml: Cén t-am a ḃíonn do lón agatWhat time do you have your lunch?

result.ga: Tá an lón seo go deas

result.html: Tá an lón seo go deasThis lunch is nice.

result.eng: I have lunch in the office.

result.eng: The soup should be ready for the lunchtime rush.
result.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh an t-anraith réidh do rabharta an lóin
